song.full_title: San Andreas Fault by Natalie Merchant
song.title: San Andreas Fault
song.lyrics:
San Andreas Fault Lyrics[Intro]

[Verse 1]
Go west, paradise is there
You'll have all that you can eat
Of milk & honey over there
You'll be the brightest star the world has ever seen
Sun-baked, slender heroine of film & magazine

[Verse 2]
So, go west
Paradise is there
You'll have all that you can eat of milk & honey over there
You'll be the brightest light the world has ever seen
The dizzy height of a jet-set life- you could never dream
[Pre-Chorus]
Your pale blue eyes, strawberry hair
Lips so sweet
Skin so fair
Your future bright
Beyond compare
It's rags to riches
Over there

[Vocal Interlude]

[Chorus]
San Andreas fault moved its fingers through the ground
Earth divided, plates collided, such an awful sound

[Chorus]
San Andreas fault moved its fingers through the ground
Terra cotta shattered, and the walls came tumbling down

[Post- Chorus]
Oh, promised land (Oh, promised land)
Oh, wicked ground (Wicked ground)
Build a dream
Tear it down
Oh, promised land (Oh, promised land)
What a wicked ground (What a wicked ground)
Build a dream, watch it all fall down
You might also like[Vocal Outro]Embed
